actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for a mandatory yea and nay vote on recommendations of the President fixing executive, legislative, and judicial pay.

summary.text: Requires a mandatory yea and nay vote on recommendations of the President fixing executive, legislative, and judicial pay transmitted to the Congress in the budget, under the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a mandatory yea and nay vote on recommendations of the President fixing executive, legislative, and judicial pay.
